title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil the spaghetti until al dente.
Whisk together eggs and grated cheese.
Combine pasta, pancetta, and egg mixture off heat.
Season with black pepper and serve immediately.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Grilled chicken pieces cooked in a rich, creamy tomato sauce.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices.
Simmer tomato sauce with cream and spices.
Add grilled chicken and cook for 10 minutes.
Serve hot with rice or naan.
